TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProcessDesigner extends System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner

Docs.summary: Base designer class for extending the design-mode behavior of a process.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Design.ProcessDesigner"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed

Docs.param: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary"> containing the properties for the class of the component.
Docs.summary: Adjusts the set of properties the process exposes through a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method adds the nonbrowsable "EnableRaisingEvents" and "StartInfo" properties to the designer's process at design time.
